title: MAGIX Audio Music Lab 2016 Premium v21.0.1.28-AMPED [deepstatus]
description:
MAGIX Audio Music Lab 2016 Premium v21.0.1.28

This high-quality collection of effective audio editing
tools captivates with technological precision and excellent audio
characteristics.
Experience music, video sound, internet radio and streaming in
unprecedented sound quality


NEW IN THIS VERSION:

Over 6,000 current internet radio stations Discover new songs,
exciting artists and informative shows with Audio & Music Lab 2016
Premium.
Enjoy music online in high quality and play it offline too.
This is made possible by the new internet radio feature.


The most important features:

Record in studio quality up to 96 kHz/24-bit
Remove noise with 1-click solutions
More than 360 new presets for sound optimization
Optimize video sound
Audio & video converter for all common formats
Restore smartphone recordings of concerts, for instance
CD import: Automatically retrieve track information & covers
Tools for visual sound analysis
Burn CDs & DVDs
Exclusive in the Premium version:
Listen to internet radio shows and use offline
Templates for optimizing video sound
Video converter for all standard formats
5 extra effects plug-ins
Direct access to effects parameters
Spectral Display for audio files
Batch processing of several files at once
VST 2 interface for additional plug-ins




[INSTALLATION]



- Unrar with you favorite archiver, such as WinRar

- install main setup file,

- Close Music Lab

- copy crack into installation folder

- Ok, It's Activated!
